Pre-Game Insights: Victor Wembanyama has been ruled out for the game against the Dallas Mavericks due to a leg injury sustained in a previous match against the Lakers.
The San Antonio Spurs will face the Dallas Mavericks in the second game of a back-to-back series.
Victor Wembanyama has faced the Dallas Mavericks four times in his career, averaging 17.5 points, 8.5 rebounds, 2.8 assists, 1.0 steals, and 2.8 blocks per game against them.
